item.title: Opinion - a view or judgement formed about something, not necessarily based on fact or knowledge
item.description: As a software developer who has been in or around the industry in one way or another for just short of twenty years now, I find the content on the wider internet landscape more and more difficult to digest. This is not a comment on the quality of the writing, the intrusive nature of modern day advertising, or even the click-bait articles that are overt in their inaccuracies and increasingly pervasive.
